entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 02:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow mixed with drizzle beginning in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to rain showers and flurries after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
